name: UelloSend SMS for WooCommerce
author: UviTech

sections.description:
Sends WooCommerce order and account related SMS notifications to customers and admin using UelloSend SMS Gateway, supports Ghanaian numbers only.

Notes

You will need to
1. Register at https://uellosend.com and generate API Keys at https://uellosend.com/user-api.php .
2. Register your SenderID at https://uellosend.com/register-brand.php and get it approved.
3. Top up your account with credit before you can send messages
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
    or
  3. Simply download the zip file and upload to WordPress via Add New Plugin user interface.
  4. Activate the plugin and configure it by clicking on Settings button.
  5. Fill in the API KEY, Sender ID and Admin Phone Number fields, save settings and that is all.
sections.faq:
Is the plugin free?

Yes! this plugin is free, just install and use.

Can it send SMS to any number?

No! This plugin only supports Ghanaian numbers.

Does it cost to send the SMS?

Yes! You must have credit in your UelloSend account.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • This is the first version so no changes yet.
